title: Port Perry Thai
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Ovo, Thai, Beer/Wine, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Serves Thai food and has a vegetarian section on their menu and several of their other dishes are available in veggie versions. Fast service. Accommodating of food allergies. Vegetable and tofu curry, vegetarian delight, eggplant Thai style, ginger tofu. Inexpensive lunch combos.
